現在沒有自助餐廳，工作人員早晨把飯送上來，雖然方便了許多，但是早餐確實需要改進，很多能看出是速食食品，而且缺乏花樣。

comments.translatedContent:
This is the worst hotel I have stayed in in recent years. The staff at the front desk are very unprofessional and have a bad service attitude. When I said that I would change the double bed, he insisted on asking us to change it in the mini program The next order was placed, and we refunded Ctrip after placing the order. The last two orders could not be refunded. After more than half an hour of tossing, we couldn't check in. The ridiculous thing is that the front desk still has a slogan of 30 seconds to check in.

Even if the service is poor, the windows of the room are wide open in winter, and the air conditioner is not turned on. It is freezing cold. It's really too bad, I hope everyone who reads the evaluation will avoid lightning.

這是我近幾年住過最差的酒店了，前台的工作人員非常的不專業服務態度也很差，到了我説換個雙床，直接加差價換的事他非要讓我們在小程序再下個訂單，下完訂單給我們退攜程的，最後兩個訂單都退不了，折騰了半個多小時都辦不了入住，可笑的是前台還寫着30秒入住的標語。

服務差就算了，大冬天的房間窗户大敞四開，也沒開空調，冷得要死。真的太差了，希望看到評價的都避雷。

comments.translatedContent: Stayed here for 7 days. It's very quiet and clean. The cleaning ladies always smile and say hello to us every time we meet. It's a very comfortable interpersonal relationship! Breakfast is also very good, clean, hygienic and delicious. The environment is also very good. I would like to praise a few friends at the front desk, a taller and fatter boy, a shorter boy with glasses, and a girl about the same height as her, Xiao Yuan Tongxiao! On the first day we came here, we asked a lot of small questions because of room changes and breakfast issues. These guys were very patient, very detailed, and explained over and over again. Later, because of invoice issues and luggage storage, we had to upgrade the room type. I have communicated with them several times about the problem, and every time they are warm, polite, thoughtful, meticulous and courteous, which makes several of our colleagues admire us! Professional quality and professional skills go hand in hand! I heard that they are all born around 2000, and I admire them very much! Learn from you! I hope the store manager will praise them, they are really good! There is also a girl who has few interactions but is also very polite and serious! In short, I am not asking for help. Because of these friends, I will definitely come here next time I go on a business trip! Come on! You guys have a bright future!

feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest: Thank you very much for your affirmation of the store's service. The store is only 450 meters away from Suzhouqiao Subway Station (Line 16) and only takes 10 minutes to walk. There are all kinds of restaurants near the store, which is very convenient; it is close to Renmin University and Beijing The University of Foreign Studies is within a 10-minute drive and the location is very convenient. The store is one of the few stores nearby that has its own parking lot. The store is free for hotel guests and has ample parking spaces.

comments.translatedContent:
The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Suzhouqiao Subway Station. The facade is a bit simple and easy to miss on the road, but the service has many advantages.
1. Xiao Li, the service guy at the front desk, is enthusiastic and thoughtful, helping to verify orders, taking the initiative to make room cards (if he forgets to bring his room card, he makes one, and he takes the trouble to make several), and he also enthusiastically helps to microwave the guests’ meals in the restaurant. , give him 5 points of praise
2. The service of the small robot delivering to the room is very good
3. There is free freshly ground coffee in the hotel lobby, which is very welcoming.
4. The hotel provides 8 bottles of water every day, which is quite user-friendly in Beijing during the summer.
5. Recommend the superior twin room, the two 1.5m large beds are very comfortable
6. The breakfast is cleaner than expected, and the breakfast noodles are especially recommended. It would be better if there was bread and butter
7. The tea set and tea bags provided in the room are delicious. After a long day of playing, it is very relaxing to drink for a while.

When you upgrade to the Huazhu Club, you will get a free breakfast. We found out later that Xiao Li at the front desk enthusiastically reissued the application and refunded the extra breakfast fees paid several times before. Thank you!

Also in need of improvement are:
1. The public corridor in the room is relatively old, the carpet is a bit dark, and the ventilation generally has a smell.
2. There was a lot of dust on the clothes hangers when I checked in.
3. The handle of the sink switch will fall off
4. The hair dryer has poor contact and blows air intermittently.
5. The smart toilet is too sensitive and flushes automatically before it is finished (it is unhygienic to sit on it while flushing)
comments.content:
酒店距離蘇州橋地鐵站步行10分鐘。門面有些簡陋，在路上很容易錯過，但服務上優點挺多
1. 前台的服務小哥哥小李服務熱心周到，幫忙核實訂單，主動製作房卡（忘帶房卡就做一張，做了好幾張不厭其煩），還熱心幫忙到餐廳微波爐加熱客人的餐食，給他5分好評
2. 小機器人送屋到房間的服務很不錯
3. 酒店大堂就有免費的現磨咖啡，很熱情
4. 酒店每天提供8瓶水，在大夏天的北京，相當人性化
5. 推薦高級雙床房，2張1.5m大床很舒服
6. 早餐比想象中的乾淨，特別推薦早餐的麪。要是有麪包和黃油更好了
7. 房間配了茶具茶包好喝，玩累一整天回來喝上一會挺解壓的

辦理華住會升級會員還送一份早餐。我們後面才知道，前台小李熱心補辦還退了前面幾次額外付款的早餐費，謝謝！

需要提升的也有：
1. 房間公共走道比較舊，地毯有些暗，通風一般有些味道
2. 入住時衣架上好多灰
3. 洗手池開關把手會掉下來
4. 吹風機接觸不好，斷斷續續送風
5. 智能馬桶感應過於靈敏，還沒結束就自動沖沖（沖起來時坐在上面不衞生）

comments.content: 高考定的小時房，房間不大，但是很舒適，也比較新，床和床品很舒服，居然還有乳膠枕，這個太舒服了。馬桶是自動的。唯一的缺點衹有一個椅子，然後就是床，兩個人的話，一個人必須上床呆著。還有就是孩子剛睡下，就來錄音電話，問退不退房。嚴重打擾了休息。不過還是推薦的。停車非常不方便，設計了幾個車位，但是死衚衕，調頭出來很困難。還不如沒有車位。

comments.content:
前兩天在北京全季度過了愉快的3晚。首先，我要讚譽一下這家酒店的整體環境，温馨舒適，讓我有賓至如歸的感覺。尤其是前台的小李同志，給我留下了深刻的印象。從我辦理入住開始，就可以感受到小李同志的熱情服務態度。他耐心解答了我關於房間設施、周邊交通等方面的問題，還主動為我推薦了附近的美食景點。每當我回到酒店或離開時，小李都會以誠摯的微笑和熱情的問候，讓我倍感親切。此外，我在入住期間遇到了一些小問題，小李在得知後立即幫助解決，讓我十分感激。他的專業素養和敬業精神讓我為之贊歎，真正體現了全季酒店優質服務的精神。
在此，我要特別表揚一下前台的小李同志，他是全季酒店蘇州橋店的明星員工，為客人提供了出色的服務體驗。我會向身邊的朋友們推薦這家酒店，並期待下次再來感受小李同志熱情周到的服務！
